Key Match Events: Peyton Watson blocked a shot in the closing seconds to secure the win for the Nuggets
Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 23 points, 20 rebounds, and 16 assists
Post-Match Reflections: Russell Westbrook expressed satisfaction with the team's comeback victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets were without Aaron Gordon and Jamal Murray due to injuries
Others: The Thunder's Jalen Williams had a double-double with 29 points, 10 rebounds, and 9 assists
The Nuggets outscored the Thunder 17-7 in a crucial run to take control of the game
